alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Ottawa; Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 19 at 2:01PM CDT until March 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 020, AND 034... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM CDT Sunday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 008, 020, and 034. * WIND...South winds sustained between 20 and 25 mph with gusts approaching 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...Between 18 and 22 percent. * HIGHEST THREAT...Along and west of Highway 81. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
